timelineEffects.name: Timeline Effects
description: If Timeline Effects are turned on, major events (geological, political, etc) will have large effect on the supply/demand of markets.

priceFluctuation.name: Price Fluctuation
description: If Price Fluctuations are turned on, market prices will alter slightly based on supply and demand.

itemVariance.name: Item Variance
description: If Item Variance is turned on, each market will only supply a subset of all available items based on local population, technology, wealth, etc.
